Class VideoDetailsDialog

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component

                    +--java.awt.Dialog
                          |
                          +--javax.swing.JDialog
                                |
                                +--VideoDetailsDialog
public class VideoDetailsDialog
extends JDialog

This class displays the details of a video recording. It shows the producer's name, recording title and price. Also, the dialog shows an image of the recording along with a list of actors.

Usage Example: 


     VideoDetailsDialog myDetailsDialog = new VideoDetailsDialog(myParentFrame, myRecording);
     myDetailsDialog.setVisible(true);

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

VideoDetailsDialog

public VideoDetailsDialog(Frame theParentFrame,
                          VideoRecording theVideoRecording)
Constructs a modal dialog for a given video recording. This version uses the artist name and recording title for the dialog title.
Parameters:
theParentFrame - the parent frame for this dialog
theVideoRecording - the video recording to display

VideoDetailsDialog

public VideoDetailsDialog(Frame theParentFrame,
                          String theTitle,
                          VideoRecording theVideoRecording)
Constructs a modal dialog for a given video recording. This version allows you to customize the title
Parameters:
theParentFrame - the parent frame for this dialog
theVideoRecording - the video recording to display
